athawuda, sabhapathi - aar. ee. es. ech. ranasinha (injinerumaya karyayan pilibanda madhyama upadeshaka karyanshaya), pradhana lekam - sunanda kodagoda (mahajana bankuwa), bhandagarika - em. ji. en. premasiri (mahajana bankuwa), upa sabhapathiwaru - inoka athapaththu (rajya injineru sansthawa), nilanthi sumanasekara (jathika ithirikirime bankuwa), upa lekam - em. ee. dab. kumarasiri (jathika chithrapata sansthawa), tharanga lekam ‚Äì en. di. pi. si. wijegunawardhana (lekhawus aayathanaya), upa tharanga lekam - di.
